task.title: Starting the Sametime Administration Tool
task.shortdesc: The HCL Sametime Administration Tool provides access to administration features on the Sametime Community Server that are not available on the Sametime System Console.

context.p: If you used previous versions of Sametime, note that access to the Administration Tool has changed, and some of the administrative features have moved to the Sametime System Console.

step.cmd: Open a browser and navigate to Enter the URL for the Sametime Community server that you want to administer.

info.p: where Community_Server_host_name is the fully qualified host name and domain of the Community Server.

step.cmd: Log in to the Administration tool using the HCL Domino administrator account that you specified in the guided activity for installing the Community Server.
